hoodies.name: Code Hoodie
hoodies.description: Premium cotton hoodie designed for developers and tech lovers.Features a sleek printed source-code pattern and a cozy fleece interior.Ideal for coding marathons, study nights, or casual wear.

hoodies.name: Gym Hoodie
hoodies.description: Comfort-fit cotton hoodie made for workouts and active wear.Soft inner lining provides warmth without restricting movement.Perfect for gym sessions, runs, or casual everyday outfits.

jackets.name: Leather Jacket
jackets.description: Classic black leather jacket crafted for a timeless look.Made from genuine leather with durable inner lining.Perfect for both casual and evening wear.

jackets.name: Puffer Jacket
jackets.description: Lightweight insulated jacket built to keep you warm in cold weather.Features water-resistant nylon shell and soft synthetic filling.Ideal for outdoor adventures and winter city wear.

pants.name: Khaki Pants
pants.description: Classic khaki trousers made from soft cotton twill fabric.Tailored fit with side and back pockets for everyday comfort.Perfect for casual outings or semi-formal occasions.

pants.name: Black Pants
pants.description: Sleek black pants with a clean modern cut.Made from stretchable cotton blend for flexibility and comfort.Ideal for office wear, events, or a casual evening look.

pyjamas.name: Black Printed Pyjamas
pyjamas.description: Soft cotton pyjamas with a stylish black printed pattern.Breathable and lightweight, offering maximum comfort for sleep or lounging.Designed for a relaxed fit and everyday use.

pyjamas.name: Red Printed Pyjamas
pyjamas.description: Comfortable red pyjamas with a playful printed design.Made from soft breathable fabric for a cozy night's sleep.Perfect for winter nights or relaxed weekend mornings.
